Generation VI.X: When the Kalos region's ecosystem falls into disarray, it appears and reveals its secret power.
Generation VI.Y: It's hypothesized that it's monitoring those who destroy the ecosystem from deep in the cave where it lives.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: When the Kalos region's ecosystem falls into disarray, it appears and reveals its secret power.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: It's hypothesized that it's monitoring those who destroy the ecosystem from deep in the cave where it lives.

Generation VII.Sun: This is Zygarde's form at times when it uses its overwhelming power to suppress those who endanger the ecosystem.
Generation VII.Moon: This is Zygarde's 100% form. It has enough power to overwhelm even Xerneas or Yveltal.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: This is Zygarde's perfected form. From the orifice on its chest, it radiates high-powered energy that eliminates everything.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Born when all of Zygarde's cells have been gathered together, it uses force to neutralize those who harm the ecosystem.

Generation VII.Sun: Aether Base on Route 16 ( Reassembly Unit ) ( Forme and Ability determined by number of Zygarde Cells/Cores )
Generation VII.Moon: Aether Base on Route 16 ( Reassembly Unit ) ( Forme and Ability determined by number of Zygarde Cells/Cores )
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: Resolution Cave ( 50% Forme, Aura Break ) Aether Base on Route 16 ( Gift ) ( 10% Forme, Aura Break ) Aether Base on Route 16 ( Reassembly Unit ) ( Forme and Ability determined by number of Zygarde Cells/Cores )
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Resolution Cave ( 50% Forme, Aura Break ) Aether Base on Route 16 ( Gift ) ( 10% Forme, Aura Break ) Aether Base on Route 16 ( Reassembly Unit ) ( Forme and Ability determined by number of Zygarde Cells/Cores )

Generation VIII.Expansion Pass: Max Lair ( Dynamax Adventure ) ( Only one ) ( 50% Forme, Power Construct )
